title: Mirror Image
content:
Mirror Image Level 2 Illusion Spell Create 3 illusory duplicates of yourself that distract attackers. Each duplicate increases your Armour Class by 3. Whenever you successfully evade an attack, one of the duplicates disappears. 10 turns Action Level 2 Spell Slot
